To all our valued clients,
We are happy to share that we have successfully added useful new features to make your fundraising campaigns even smoother.
   Emails Display Name & Reply to email
All email correspondence will display your organization’s name.
Replies will also be sent directly to your organization’s inbox.
  • Statements and Receipts showcase your organization
  • Donary remains in the background
   Sum By Cards
  • Pledges
When reviewing pledges, the cards would display All, Open, or Paid.
This provides an at-a-glance view of the status of each pledge and/or campaign.
  • Schedules
When reviewing scheduled payments, the cards would display All, Pending or Recent. So you know the totals and status for all campaign donations.
   Aliyos Window
We successfully corrected many bugs in the Aliya window
and added the following features;

  • Yom Tov Aliyos- When you select the date of the Yom Tov,
    all relevant aliyos will appear.
    Bellow is an example of Simchas Toirah 2022
  • If a name doesn’t appear in the search, you can
    create a New Donor in the aliyos card

  • Search for donors from the G-List.
   Donary Bug Fixes
  • Export donor tags from the donors list.

  • Export external notes when you export pledges.

  • Display external notes when printing pledge reports

  • Payments split between campaigns/reasons will display separately in the Sum By Cards

  • New field for Transactions/Payments. Amount Applied will help you see how much money was applied to each pledge.

  • Collector’s name displays in Yiddish and English for Edit Payment Card
Please do not reply to this email
